leaf_blight.name: Neem & Garlic Spray
preparation: Crush garlic cloves and soak in 2 liters of water overnight
Strain the garlic water
Mix neem oil with liquid soap in a separate container
Add the neem-soap mixture to the garlic water
Add remaining water and mix thoroughly

application.method: Spray on affected leaves and stems, covering both upper and lower leaf surfaces

powdery_mildew.name: Baking Soda & Milk Solution
preparation: Dissolve baking soda in 1 liter of warm water
Mix milk with 2 liters of water
Combine both solutions
Add vegetable oil and remaining water
Stir well until fully mixed

application.method: Spray thoroughly on all plant surfaces, especially affected areas
application.timing: Morning hours when dew has dried
application.duration: Continue until symptoms disappear, then once weekly for prevention

bacterial_spot.name: Copper-Turmeric Paste
preparation: Mix turmeric powder with buttermilk to form a paste
Dissolve copper sulfate in 2 liters of water separately
Slowly add the turmeric paste to the copper solution
Add remaining water and mix thoroughly
Let it sit for 30 minutes before use

application.method: Apply as a spray or paint directly on affected spots
application.timing: Late evening to avoid sun damage

rust.name: Compost Tea with Horsetail
preparation: Soak horsetail in 3 liters of water for 24 hours
Place compost in a cloth bag
Steep compost bag in remaining water for 3-5 days, stirring daily
Strain horsetail water and mix with compost tea
Add molasses and stir well

application.method: Spray on foliage and soil around plant base

mosaic_virus.name: Seaweed & Epsom Salt Boost
preparation: Dissolve Epsom salt in 2 liters of warm water
Add seaweed extract to the solution
Mix wood ash with remaining water and strain
Combine both solutions
Let settle for 1 hour, then use the clear liquid

application.method: Spray on healthy parts and soil to boost plant immunity
application.duration: Continue for entire season as preventive measure

anthracnose.name: Garlic-Chili-Soap Spray
preparation: Blend garlic and chili peppers with 1 liter of water
Let the mixture steep overnight
Strain through fine cloth
Add liquid soap and apple cider vinegar
Dilute with remaining water

application.method: Spray on affected areas and surrounding healthy tissue
application.duration: Continue for 3-4 weeks or until symptoms subside
